testcase.name: Test the New Customer functionality of Guru99 Bank when the Manager clicks on the 'New Customer' option to create a New Customer account.
testcase.system-out: Given The Manager navigated to the login page of Guru99 Bank and logged in with his UserID as "mngr590074" and Password as "ehadYmy".passed When the Manager clicks on 'New Customer' option from the menu..............passed Then the Manager should be redirected to the ‘Add New Customer’ page........passed And the Message “Add New Customer” should appear............................passed And the Customer Name field, Gender, Date of Birth, Address, City, State, PIN, Mobile Number, E-mail, and Password should be displayed.passed And Submit button, Reset should be displayed................................passed And the Home page Link should be visible....................................passed
